history.proof: intros d a la ls hd tl l H. intros H1. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl l H.
exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the terms "d", "ls" and "t" leads to a term fun (d0 : preDTA) (ls0 : prec_list) (t0 : term_list) => new_state_insd_def_lst d0 ls0 t0 l -> forall s : state, MapGet state d0 H1 = None -> liste_reconnait (MapPut state d0 H1 s) (prec_cons a la ls0) t0 which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "new_state_insd_def_lst" of type "forall (d : preDTA) (pl0 : prec_list) (tl0 : term_list), liste_reconnait d pl0 tl0 -> Prop" cannot be applied to the terms "d0" : "preDTA" "ls0" : "prec_list" "t0" : "term_list" "l" : "liste_reconnait d ls t" The 4th term has type "liste_reconnait d ls t" which should be coercible to "liste_reconnait d0 ls0 t0".

original: intros d a la ls hd tl l H. intros H1. unfold new_state_insd_def_lst in H1. unfold new_state_insd_def_lst. induction l. - apply H1. - apply u_merge_3_4 in H. apply H. auto.
